section.name: Overview
section.p: The "Citrus Test Framework" will give you the opportunity to test your message-based applications in an automated way.

This project aims to
automate the integration testing for EAI/SOA applications
easily simulate interface systems supporting a wide range of protocols
provide high integration test coverage for EAI/SOA applications
perform fully qualified use case tests

section.name: Technologies
section.p:
Citrus uses following technologies
Spring 2.5 as the glue for everything
SLF4J for logging
Maven as build with support for multi module projects
